p.s: I am so mad at uncle Amir!
Today, I came to visit him in his old apartment.
His ex-wife Emily came with me to stand up for me and support me, but she left fast and then there were just me and my uncle.
I explained my situation to him, that I was treated racist at a cafe and now the FBIFederal Bureau of Investigation is on me because of my immigration status.
I thought, he would finally see it.
I thought, if it is a family member that is affected, he would finally stand up for what is right and use his job for something good.
A lawyer, who'swhose job is literally to ensure justice.
But no.
He didn't.
He just stood there, trying to talk himself out of the situation.
Almost glamourizing it.
That is so disgusting!
No matter what I said, what arguments I used, he found a silly way to talk himself out of the situation.
He can't be serious, can he?
Does he actually believe, that people believe him?
Does he actually think, we have a better life in America?
We clearly don't!
Well, it doesn't really matter anymore.
My immigration is running out, and then I am finally gonna go back to Pakistan.
Really get to know my culture, my people, my religion.
But Amir?
Poor Amir, he is just going to keep on living a lie.
He is gonna find a new white wife, a new lawfirm and a new apartment.
But it is just a matter of time until his fassade falls again.
